line.comment: * $sector = [PLAYERSHIP]-> get sector
* ZH 2.0 - just let player select
* Zero Hour 2.0 - can manage Unknown sectors!
* requires a ship on site

line.text: 'В этом секторе нет корабля или станции принадлежащих вам.'
'На данный момент на него претендует раса '
'! Не могу сейчас отказаться от этого сектора.'
'На данный момент на него претендует раса '
'! Не могу сейчас передать этот сектор другой фракции.'
'Невозможно передать этот сектор из-за присутствия расы '
'Для передачи Неизвестных секторов необходимо стать нацией.'

line.comment: * ZH 2.0 allows to transfer sectors regardless of rank
* $rep = $currentRace-> get notoriety title to race [Player]: text=[FALSE]
* if $rep >= 7 AND $owner != $currentRace
* Mordan4
* Add-Ons 1.4: Abandoning a sector with an ultimatum results in a war declaration.
* ZH 2.0 - Phanon seed ship stage
* $ship = create ship: type={Argon Buster} owner=[Phanon] addto=$sector x=-90000 y=-90000 z=-90000
* $ship-> set known status to [TRUE]
* $rel = [PLAYERSHIP]-> get relation to object $ship
* $ship-> set local variable: name='mayhem_ignoreKilledSignal' value=[TRUE]
* START [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.Destroy' : object=$ship noExplosion=[TRUE]
* if $rel == [Foe]
* $t = 'Set Phanon as a Friend in your Global Friend/Foe settings and transmit to all property'
* $t = [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.ColorText' : text=$t color='w'
* = [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.Infobox' : text=$t icon='no' timeout=7000 fadeout=1000
* endsub
* else
* end
* ZH 2.0 - AI can refuse. Xenon and Phanon never refuse
* exodus factions do not want to get sectors which would put them closer to the OCV portal
* defensive factions do not want sectors near dangerous enemies
* factions which are not confident dont want isolated enclaves
* not reckless factions dont want sectors with huge enemies inside
* Add-Ons 1.4.3: A permanent war automatically refuses any offers.

line.text: ' смеётся над вашим предложением. Они никогда не примут от вас территорию.'

line.comment: * never refuse a sector which is being demanded in an ultimatum...unless the faction demanding that sector already has a permanent war.
* too much can break if those 2 scripts are currently active
* write to player logbook 'ZH.Core'
* write to player logbook 'ZH.Nomads.Build'

line.text: 'Сейчас это невозможно. Подождите несколько минут (технические ограничения).'

line.comment: * Add-Ons 1.4: Fixed ultimatum not giving truce. Giving a sector immediately removes the ultimatum. At this point the receiver will accept this sector.
* average 12 hours, modified by empire size difference
* Avoid division-by-0.
* at least half a day
* at most 3 days
* If the player instead gave the sector to someone else other than the faction that demanded the sector, instant war declaration.
* Mordan9
* Add-Ons 1.4: We need the previous owner to be unknown in order to incur a reputation penalty when conquering on behalf of Phanon.
* ZH 2.0 - we always need to build a station for the new owner to prevent other scripts from reverting the new sector ownership again.
* Add-Ons 1.4.23: Spawn defenders (parity with Mayhem.Conquer.Xenon)
* Spawn a defensive fleet.
* Insane mode spawns more defenders until player joins the OCV. However, joining the OCV reduces the number of defenders.
* Reduced defenders on insane.
* Didn't join OCV - Xenon are hostile and spawn more defenders.
* Standard defenders on easy/normal/hard
* first Phanon outpost is spawned by the PhanonCreation script which gives them starting resources
* ZH 2.0 Phanon sectors provide Xenon protection
* Add-Ons 1.4: Gifting an unknown sector to Phanon counts as if the player had conquered it for himself.
* Do not incur a reputation penalty if the previous sector's owner was the player, as the player had paid the reputation penalty prior to that. Code reused from Mayhem.Conquer.
* Get the combined empire size of both Phanon and the player. By default, the reputation loss is 500 per sector.
* Player gets a reputation penalty equal to the player's empire size + Phanon's empire size - 1. The -1 is needed because the new sector is, at this point, part of Phanon's empire.
* Any reputation loss?
* Zero Hour 1.8 - not for Coalition allies
* Add-Ons 1.3: No tutorial on insane.
* Mordan4 - The exception to this gift is their FIRST sector, which the player must drop a beacon in, in order to complete the "Close Bonds" mission and allow the phanon progression.
* Mordan3 - Whenever gifting a sector to the Phanon, they get a free jump beacon. This can be destroyed and will not be automatically replaced.
* adds infamy
* joining OCV story completion
* Mordan4
* Add-Ons 1.4: No favor point or gratitude message if the sector was given due to an ultimatum.

sval.val: В этом секторе нет корабля или станции принадлежащих вам.
сектор не ваш и не пустой

смеётся над вашим предложением. Они никогда не примут от вас территорию.
Сейчас это невозможно. Подождите несколько минут (технические ограничения).
Zero Hour 2.0 - can manage Unknown sectors!
ZH 2.0 allows to transfer sectors regardless of rank
$rep = $currentRace-> get notoriety title to race [Player]: text=[FALSE]
Add-Ons 1.4: Abandoning a sector with an ultimatum results in a war declaration.
$ship = create ship: type={Argon Buster} owner=[Phanon] addto=$sector x=-90000 y=-90000 z=-90000
$t = 'Set Phanon as a Friend in your Global Friend/Foe settings and transmit to all property'
= [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.Infobox' : text=$t icon='no' timeout=7000 fadeout=1000
ZH 2.0 - AI can refuse. Xenon and Phanon never refuse
exodus factions do not want to get sectors which would put them closer to the OCV portal
defensive factions do not want sectors near dangerous enemies
factions which are not confident dont want isolated enclaves
not reckless factions dont want sectors with huge enemies inside
Add-Ons 1.4.3: A permanent war automatically refuses any offers.
never refuse a sector which is being demanded in an ultimatum...unless the faction demanding that sector already has a permanent war.
too much can break if those 2 scripts are currently active
Add-Ons 1.4: Fixed ultimatum not giving truce. Giving a sector immediately removes the ultimatum. At this point the receiver will accept this sector.
average 12 hours, modified by empire size difference
If the player instead gave the sector to someone else other than the faction that demanded the sector, instant war declaration.
Add-Ons 1.4: We need the previous owner to be unknown in order to incur a reputation penalty when conquering on behalf of Phanon.
ZH 2.0 - we always need to build a station for the new owner to prevent other scripts from reverting the new sector ownership again.
Insane mode spawns more defenders until player joins the OCV. However, joining the OCV reduces the number of defenders.
Didn't join OCV - Xenon are hostile and spawn more defenders.
first Phanon outpost is spawned by the PhanonCreation script which gives them starting resources
ZH 2.0 Phanon sectors provide Xenon protection
Add-Ons 1.4: Gifting an unknown sector to Phanon counts as if the player had conquered it for himself.
Do not incur a reputation penalty if the previous sector's owner was the player, as the player had paid the reputation penalty prior to that. Code reused from Mayhem.Conquer.
Get the combined empire size of both Phanon and the player. By default, the reputation loss is 500 per sector.
Player gets a reputation penalty equal to the player's empire size + Phanon's empire size - 1. The -1 is needed because the new sector is, at this point, part of Phanon's empire.
Zero Hour 1.8 - not for Coalition allies
Mordan4 - The exception to this gift is their FIRST sector, which the player must drop a beacon in, in order to complete the "Close Bonds" mission and allow the phanon progression.
Mordan3 - Whenever gifting a sector to the Phanon, they get a free jump beacon. This can be destroyed and will not be automatically replaced.
Add-Ons 1.4: No favor point or gratitude message if the sector was given due to an ultimatum.
